other_tests.findings: 50 cells/mm3, of which 80% were polymorphonuclear cells.
Positive for Brucella species, identified as REV 1 (vaccine strain) Brucella mellitensis.
Presence of the same species of Brucella.
Discovered linezolid-resistant, vancomycin-resistant Enterococcus faecium isolated during annual antibiogram preparation.
other_tests.changes_over_time: New software implemented for timely retrieval of resistance data.
